name: Sse-suh.github.io
body:
# SSE projects at Github

This is the Github projects page of the [Software Systems Engineering (SSE)](http://www.sse.uni-hildesheim.de) group at the [University of Hildesheim](http://www.uni-hildesheim.de).

The following projects will be made available on Github in the next few days:
* EASy-Producer, a product line tool developed in several projects such as [FP7 INDENICA](http://www.indenica.eu) or BMWi ScaleLog
* SPASS-Meter, a flexible resource monitoring framework for Java (also developed in [FP7 INDENICA](http://www.indenica.eu)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
